src:
Burja bo do večera ponehala
01 Nov 2019, 11:18 by STA

Danes bo na Primorskem in v gorah pretežno jasno. Drugod bo sprva še precej oblačno, čez dan pa se bodo oblaki trgali. Burja na Primorskem bo do večera povsod ponehala. Najvišje dnevne temperature bodo od 5 do 9, na Primorskem do okoli 15 stopinj Celzija, je zapisano na spletnih straneh Agencije RS za okolje.



Foto: Mirjana Cerin

LJUBLJANA > V soboto bo na severovzhodu sprva še dokaj sončno. Drugod bo pretežno oblačno, v zahodni ter delu osrednje in južne Slovenije bo začelo deževati. V višjih legah in ponekod po nižinah bo pihal jugozahodni veter. Najnižje jutranje temperature bodo od 2 do 6, na Primorskem okoli 10, najvišje dnevne od 9 do 15 stopinj Celzija.
Obeti: V nedeljo bo oblačno s padavinami, ki bodo pogostejše v zahodni Sloveniji. Ob morju bo pihal jugo, ponekod v notranjosti veter južnih smeri.
V ponedeljek bo sprva oblačno s padavinami, ki bodo popoldne ponehale. Prehodno se bo delno zjasnilo.
Vremenska slika: Nad vzhodno Evropo je območje visokega zračnega tlaka, nad zahodno Evropo in bližnjim Atlantikom pa več ciklonskih območij z vremenskimi frontami. V spodnjih plasteh ozračja priteka od jugovzhoda hladen in vlažen zrak.
Napoved za sosednje pokrajine: Danes bo ob Jadranu in v sosednjih pokrajinah Italije sončno. Drugod bo sprva pretežno oblačno, popoldne se bo ponekod delno zjasnilo. Burja ob severnem Jadranu bo slabela.
V soboto bo v krajih vzhodno od nas še delno jasno. Drugod bo oblačno, v krajih zahodno in južno od nas bo občasno deževalo.
Biovreme: Danes bodo občutljivi ljudje imeli manjše vremensko pogojene težave, večini ljudi pa vreme ne bo povzročalo opaznih težav.
text:
The storm will be gone by the evening
01 Nov 2019, 11:18 by STA

Today, it will be mostly clear in the Littoral and the mountains. Elsewhere it will be quite cloudy, but during the day the clouds will shatter. The storm in Primorska will end everywhere by the evening. The highest daily temperatures will be from 5 to 9, in the Primorska region to about 15 degrees Celsius, according to the website of the Environmental Agency of the Republic of Slovenia.



Photo: Mirjana Cerin

LJUBLJANA> It will be quite sunny in the north-east on Saturday. Elsewhere it will be mostly cloudy, in western and central and southern Slovenia it will start to rain. In higher positions and in some parts of the lowlands the southwest wind will blow. The lowest morning temperatures will be from 2 to 6, in the Littoral around 10, the highest daily from 9 to 15 degrees Celsius.
Outlook: Sunday will be cloudy with more frequent precipitation in western Slovenia. It will be blowing south by the sea, in some places in the south by wind.
On Monday, it will initially be cloudy with precipitation that will be overcast in the afternoon. The transition will be partially clarified.
Weather picture: Above Eastern Europe there is a region of high air pressure, and above Western Europe and the near Atlantic there are several cyclone zones with weather fronts. In the lower layers of the atmosphere, cool and moist air flows from the southeast.
Forecast for neighboring provinces: Today it will be sunny along the Adriatic and in the neighboring provinces of Italy. Elsewhere it will be mostly cloudy and partly cloudy in the afternoon. The storm along the northern Adriatic will weaken.
It will be partly clear in places east of us on Saturday. Elsewhere it will be cloudy, in places west and south of us it will occasionally rain.
Bio-weather: Today, sensitive people will have minor weather conditions, and most people will not be affected by the weather.
